msg.msgText: Unable to start TCP endpoint: Endpoint={0} Port={1} Error={2} RC={3} TcpError={4} Errno={5}.

msgExplanation.p: The Message Gateway server is unable to create a socket for one of the TCP endpoints that was configured.

msgUserResponse.p: Ensure that the specified address and port is not in use for another purpose. Modify the Message Gateway configuration as required.
